description: Try our easy to follow 3 Step Lemon Chicken With Capers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Mains,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Traybake,Sesame free,Potato,Soy free,Chicken,Asparagus,Peanut free
name: 3 Step Lemon Chicken With Capers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 chicken thigh cutlets, bone in (skin on)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Place butter, garlic and thyme in a baking pan and place in the oven for 5 minutes or until butter melts.
Add chicken to pan and brush all over with garlic butter. Add potato and capsicum, turning to coat in butter. Tuck lemon among chicken. Add stock and capers and season.
Bake for 30 minutes or until chicken is golden and cooked through. Divide chicken and vegetables among plates, spoon over sauce and serve with asparagus.
